bid_summary: ADDENDUM No. 2 RFP JA-207652 Student and Staff Computing Devices The Purpose of this Addendum is to extend the due date of this RFP. The new due date for this RFP will be July 9, 2024 at 2:00 PM CST. The information in this Addendum is hereby incorporated and made part of any contract awarded pursuant to this solicitation. Please sign this addendum and submit along with your copies of the proposal. ALL OTHER PROVISIONS AND OTHER TERMS AND CONDITIONS REMAIN UNCHANGED. BIDDERS ARE REQUIRED TO ACKNOWLEDGE AND RETURN/SUBMIT A COPY OF THIS ADDENDUM WITH THEIR PROPOSAL. Company Name: Submitterâ€™s Name/Title:...
